sourcesContent:
import "../styles/toolbar.scss" import { useActions } from './../hooks/useActions' import { useTypedSelector } from './../hooks/useTypedSelector' import Rect from './../tools/rect' import Brush from "../tools/brush" import Circle from './../tools/circle' import Eraser from './../tools/eraser' import Line from './../tools/line' export const ToolBar = () => { const {setTool} = useActions() const canvas = useTypedSelector(state => state.canvas.canvas) const tool = useTypedSelector(state => state.tool.tool) return
}
